why: Ever rented an apartment? Yeah, thats why. Didnt wrote the analyser engine, but I will someday
storyParas: So when I was moving to US for studies and hunting apartments, I didnt knew that hunting for apartments would be such a tormenting process
Wrote a project on python which used selenium to pull data from google apartment reviews, and analyse for authenticity
My plan was to check the number of bad reviews, number of reviews by indians to get the authenticity and usefulness of a review(Didnt wrote this part)
Provide a list of apartments, and it will fetch the data
